texts.value: Nonselective, high-affinity receptor for both orexin-A and orexin-B neuropeptides (PubMed:26950369, PubMed:9491897). Triggers an increase in cytoplasmic Ca(2+) levels in response to orexin-A binding (PubMed:26950369, PubMed:9491897)
The N-terminal region is required for orexin signaling
Belongs to the G-protein coupled receptor 1 family
